amendment.description: To provide a substitute for section 1035, relating to the protection of the operational files of the National Security Agency.

vote.text: Amendment SA 779 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 779 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Allard. (consideration: CR S6837-6838; text: CR S6837-6838) To provide a substitute for section 1035, relating to the protection of the operational files of the National Security Agency.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 779 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 779 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Allard.
